about_the_game:
About This Content


Enjoy a nice drink and take in stunning scenery on relaxing Swiss rail journeys; the unique and legendary Projekt fahrBAR coach comes to Train Simulator Classic courtesy of Rivet Games!

Originating from 1913 as a postal wagon, the RhB’s WR-S 3823 saw over 60 years of service before being set aside in 1978. It was revived 3 years later and repurposed as the “Calenda-Wagon” – serving drinks on ice-hockey trains across the network, but would once again fall by the wayside.

Enter, Projekt fahrBAR, which in 2019 acquired the coach for future restoration with an end goal of returning the classic car to the railways. The dedicated team have since spent the past few years repairing and refurbishing every aspect of the coach, getting it ready to hopefully one day, bring back the classic bar on-rails.

In Train Simulator Classic, you can experience what the FahrBAR will be like once the team behind its restoration have completed the heartfelt project, enjoy quaint trips along the RhB network, and don’t forget to party with disco mode!

Preservation efforts are more than restoring locos, keeping heritage rolling stock alive is just as important, and with every purchase of the FahrBAR Coach for Train Simulator Classic, proceeds go towards the restoration of the real former WR-S 3823 bar coach, allowing it to eventually return into service. Cheers!

Included Scenarios


Take the FahrBAR Coach across Switzerland and beyond with one Standard scenario included for each of the available RhB routes from Thomson Interactive and Rivet Games:

  • [fahrBAR] Rhine Gorge Excursion (Surselva Line)
  • [fahrBAR] Visit to Italy - Part 1 (Bernina Pass)
  • [fahrBAR] Visit to Italy - Part 2 (Bernina Line)
  • [fahrBAR] Sledging Adventure Shuttle (Albula Line)
  • [fahrBAR] Ice Hockey Celebration (Arosa Line)
  • [fahrBAR] Engadin Skimarathon Service (Engadine Line)

Please Note: at least one of the following is required, as a separate purchase, in order to play the relevant scenarios featured in this add-on.

  • Albula Line: St Moritz - Thusis Route Add-On
  • Arosa Line Route Add-On
  • Bernina Pass: St Moritz – Poschiavo Route Add-On
  • Bernina Line: Poschiavo - Tirano Route Add-On
  • Surselva Line: Reichenau-Tamins - Disentis/Mustér Route Add-On
  • Engadin Linie: Pontresina - Scuol-Tarasp Route Add-On

More scenarios are available on the Steam Workshop online and in-game. Train Simulator’s Steam Workshop scenarios are free and easy to download, adding many more hours of exciting gameplay. With scenarios being added daily, why don’t you check it out now!

Key Features


  • Highly detailed recreation of what the FahrBAR project will look like upon completion
  • Custom coloured lighting (including disco mode) set according to coach number
  • Animated ramp, door steps, handbrake and dynamo
  • Numerous camera positions in the detailed passenger view
  • 6 Standard scenarios (one for each of the Swiss RhB routes)
  • Download size: 29.1 MB

Minimum for 32-bit:
  • OS *: 32-bit Windows 7 Service Pack 1, 8.1 or 10 Required (Other OS versions and types are not supported)
  • Processor: Intel Core-i3 4330 3.50 GHz Dual Core or AMD A8 6600K 3.90 GHz Quad Core or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon R9 Graphics with 1 GB Dedicated VRAM or Better
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Connection (May incur additional costs for use)
  • Storage: 40 GB or more available space (Additional Add-Ons will require more)
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: Requires mouse and keyboard or Xbox Controller
Laptop, Notebook, Mobile or Low Power versions of the above specifications (including Intel or Integrated Graphics) may work but are not supported. Updates to Chipset, Graphics and Audio Device Drivers may be required. For information relating to recommended specifications for Train Simulator 64-bit, please refer to the Train Simulator Classic User Guide.
